channel.title: The Best of Car Talk
channel.description: America's funniest auto mechanics take calls from weary car owners all over the country, and crack wise while they diagnose Dodges and dismiss Diahatsus. You don't have to know anything about cars to love this one hour weekly laugh fest.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2001-2021 Tappet Brothers LLC - For Personal Use Only
channel.itunes:summary: America's funniest auto mechanics take calls from weary car owners all over the country, and crack wise while they diagnose Dodges and dismiss Diahatsus. You don't have to know anything about cars to love this one hour weekly laugh fest.
channel.itunes:subtitle: America's funniest mechanics take calls from car owners.
channel.itunes:author: NPR

item.title: #2289: Can I Borrow Your Airbag for a Moment?
item.description: Back when airbags were a new thing, it was pretty common that cars had only one and it was for the driver. Of course, this meant that front seat passengers were in a relatively vulnerable position in the event of a front-end crash. But some passengers refused to accept their crash-dummy fate. Check it out, along with more calls and a new puzzler on this episode of the Best of Car Talk.
item.copyright: Copyright 2001-2021 Tappet Brothers LLC - For Personal Use Only

item.title: #2288: The True Meaning of Lifetime Warranty
item.description: Dick from Texas felt good about purchasing a 'lifetime warranty' along with the replacement alternator for his Ford Van. Sadly, Click and Clack had to inform him that what he actually purchased is a 'lifetime' of having to replace these cheap alternators. Or can Dick be spared this cruel repair purgatory? Find out on this episode of the Best of Car Talk.
item.copyright: Copyright 2001-2021 Tappet Brothers LLC - For Personal Use Only

item.title: #2287: The Mitsubishi Doppelganger
item.description: Stella thinks one of her two Mitsubishis is possessed of a sinister mechanical nature. It is constantly breaking down and wearing out parts, unlike it's twin. Sound familiar? Our two hosts are each similarly convinced that the other is a sinister and malevolent force trying to drive him crazy. Is there any chance of saving Stella's 'good' Mitsubishi here? Find out on this episode of the Best of Car Talk.
item.copyright: Copyright 2001-2021 Tappet Brothers LLC - For Personal Use Only

item.title: #2286: A Mind is a Terrible Thing to Waste
item.description: Judy from Arkansas had no sooner described the conditions under which her car was giving her trouble when Tommy confidently and successfully predicted what the car's problem was. Could this be a case of clairvoyance? Or is this the less common Judyvoyance? Find out if the Tappet Brothers were able to help either Claire or Judy on this episode of the Best of Car Talk.
item.copyright: Copyright 2001-2021 Tappet Brothers LLC - For Personal Use Only
